 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מְלַח‎</span>] **verb denominative** with accusative of congnate meaning with verb, ==eat salt==; — 

**Pe\`al** ***Perfect*** 1 plural <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מְלַחְנָא‎</span> [[Ezra.4.14|Ezra 4:14]] ***we have eaten the salt of the palace*** (so most), i.e. have assumed obligations of loyalty, compare [[BDB#Marti|M]]<sup>69\*</sup> [[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 71, 2</sup> (and Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be intimate with*** [[BDB#PS|PS]]<sup>2134</sup>); [[BDB#Str|Str]] (after [[BDB#Nes|Nes]]<sup>MM 30 f.</sup>) thinks noun with suffix: ***our salt is the salt of the palace.***
